books.title: The Analects
books.author: Confucius
books.description: A collection of sayings and ideas attributed to the Chinese philosopher Confucius.
books.descriptionZh: 记录孔子及其弟子言行的语录集。

books.title: The Analects
books.author: D. C. Lau
books.description: A critical translation of the core Confucian text by the renowned scholar D.C. Lau.
books.descriptionZh: 由著名学者刘殿爵教授翻译的儒家核心文献。

books.title: Tao Te Ching
books.author: Laozi
books.description: A fundamental text for both philosophical and religious Taoism.
books.descriptionZh: 道家哲学思想的重要来源。

books.title: Art of War
books.titleKh: សិល្បៈសង្គ្រាម
books.author: Sun Tzu
books.description: An ancient Chinese military treatise attributed to Sun Tzu.
books.descriptionZh: 世界上最早的兵书之一。

articles.title: The Resonance of Ancient Music
articles.titleKh: សំឡេងនៃតន្ត្រីបុរាណ
articles.excerpt: Exploring how traditional Chinese musical instruments like the Erhu and Pipa connect modern audiences.
articles.excerptZh: 探讨二胡、琵琶等中国传统乐器如何将现代观众联系在一起。
articles.author: Elena Wong

articles.title: Confucian Values in the Digital Age
articles.titleZh: 数字时代的儒家价值观
articles.titleKh: តម្លៃខុងជឺក្នុងយុគសម័យឌីជីថល
articles.excerpt: Can ancient wisdom regarding filial piety guide our interactions in a hyper-connected world?
articles.excerptZh: 关于孝道的古老智慧能否指导我们在高度互联的世界中的互动？
articles.author: Dr. Liang Chen

artists.name: Confucius
artists.bio: Chinese philosopher and politician of the Spring and Autumn period. The philosophy of Confucius, also known as Confucianism, emphasized personal and governmental morality, correctness of social relationships, justice, kindness, and sincerity.
artists.bioZh: 春秋时期的中国哲学家和政治家。孔子的哲学（也称为儒家思想）强调个人和政府的道德、社会关系的正确性、正义、善良和真诚。

artists.name: Laozi
artists.bio: Ancient Chinese philosopher and writer, renowned author of the Tao Te Ching and the founder of philosophical Taoism.
artists.bioZh: 中国古代哲学家和作家，著名的《道德经》作者和道家哲学的创始人。

artists.name: Sun Tzu
artists.roleKh: អ្នកយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រយោធា
artists.bio: Chinese general, military strategist, writer, and philosopher who lived in the Eastern Zhou period. Sun Tzu is traditionally credited as the author of The Art of War.
artists.bioZh: 中国东周时期的将军、军事家、作家和哲学家。孙武被认为是《孙子兵法》的作者。

artists.name: Shen Yun Symphony
artists.nameKh: វង់តន្រ្តី សិន យុន
artists.roleKh: វង់តន្រ្តី
artists.bio: Shen Yun Symphony Orchestra blends the spirit of Chinese music with the power of a Western orchestra.
artists.bioZh: 神韵交响乐团将中国音乐的精神与西方管弦乐团的力量完美结合。

artists.name: D. C. Lau
artists.roleKh: អ្នកប្រាជ្ញ
artists.bio: D.C. Lau was a renowned sinologist and translator of Chinese classics, best known for his translations of the Tao Te Ching, the Analects, and Mencius.
artists.bioZh: 刘殿爵是一位著名的汉学家和中国典籍翻译家，以翻译《道德经》、《论语》和《孟子》而闻名。

artists.name: Elena Wong
artists.roleKh: អ្នកតន្ត្រីវិទ្យា
artists.bio: Expert in traditional Asian instruments and their modern adaptations.
artists.bioZh: 传统亚洲乐器及其现代改编专家。

artists.name: Prof. Zhang
artists.nameKh: សាស្ត្រាចារ្យ Zhang
artists.roleKh: ប្រវត្តិវិទូ
artists.bio: Professor of Ancient Chinese History and Culture, specializing in the Tang Dynasty.
artists.bioZh: 中国古代历史文化教授，主攻唐代历史。
